name: DDEV-BOT
description: Enhance your WhatsApp experience with DDEV-BOT, a Node.js-powered bot built to elevate your interactions.

OWNER_NAME.description: The name of the Bot Owner

AUTO_STATUS_SAVER.description: Automatically saves the status of every person and sends it to the log number.

AUTO_STATUS_READER.description: Automatically views the status of every person.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: This field will be ignored. Heroku will generate a random app name.

ANTI_BAD_WORD.description: Enter words here if you want the bad word filter enabled; otherwise, leave it blank.

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Enter 'true' or 'false' to enable or disable continuous bot availability.

ANTILINK_ACTION.description: Action to be taken for antilink violations.

LEVEL_UP_MESSAGE.description: Set to 'true' if you want the bot to send a Level up message in the chat.

READ_MESSAGE.description: Set to 'true' if you want the bot to read all messages.

PREFIX.description: Enter your desired prefix for the bot.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Phone numbers of users you want to be admins for the bot (in international format without '+' and multiple numbers separated by a comma ',')

SESSION_ID.description: Insert the long SESSION_ID here. If you don't have one, visit https://replit.com/@DARK-DEVIL-BOTZ/DDEV-SESSION?v=1

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: Insert your OPENAI API key here. Get it from platform.openai.com

MONGODB_URI.description: A secret string for MongoDB connection (required). Change for a better experience.

THEME.description: Specify the theme name you want to use. The available theme is 'DDEV'; do not change it to avoid errors.

WORKTYPE.description: Specify the worktype of your bot: use 'public' or 'private'. If private, only the bot number can use it; if public, everyone can use it.

AUTO_REACTION.description: React with emojis to all commands.

heroku.description: Specify whether the bot is hosted on Heroku or not.
